description: This is a Docker image builder. The final result of the script build_docker.sh is an image containing the SLAC's EPICS environment needed to build EPICS IOCs in RHEL6 or CentOS 6, including EPICS base, modules, packages, and environment variables. The builder can work with only one EPICS base version of choice, but it can contain multiple versions of the same module and package.
name: SLAC's EPICS building RHEL6/CentOS 6 environment Docker image
